schema.description: 工作空间成员用户名的关键字。

工作空间成员列表的当前页码：

- 起始值：1
- 默认值：1

分页查询时的每页行数：

- 默认值：10
- 最大值：1000

Success.description:
是否请求成功。取值范围：

- true：请求成功
- false：请求失败

Result.description: 返回成员列表的分页结果，成员的详细信息列表存放在返回参数Data中。

PageSize.description: 请求接口时设置的每页行数。

NickName.example: 我就是那个分析师大神

Role.description: 空间成员的预置空间角色信息。

RoleId.description:
预置角色ID。取值范围：

- 25：空间管理员
- 26：空间开发者
- 27：空间分析师
- 30：空间查看者

400.errorMessage: The workspace is not owned by the organization.
The group workspace does not exist.
The user is not in your organization.
The specified instance does not exist.
The specified organizational unit does not exist.
An error occurred while verifying parameters.
You are not an administrator of this organization.
Your instance version or access key is not allowed to call the API operation, only professional version supports calling.
The specified user does not exist.
Only administrators of the group workspace can perform this operation.
The object you are operating does not exist or has been deleted.
You are not an administrator or API call auth user of this organization.

    "PageSize": 10,

      {

        "Role": {
          "RoleCode": "role_workspace_admin",
          "RoleName": "管理员",
          "RoleId": 25
        }
      }
    ]
  }
}","errorExample":""},{"type":"xml","example":"<QueryWorkspaceUserListResponse>
    <Success>true</Success>
    <RequestId>D787E1A3-A93C-424A-B626-C2B05DF8D885</RequestId>
    <Result>
        <TotalPages>1</TotalPages>
        <PageNum>1</PageNum>
        <PageSize>10</PageSize>
        <TotalNum>1</TotalNum>
        <Data>
            <UserId>de4bc5f9429141cc8091cdd1c15b****</UserId>

            <NickName>我就是那个分析师大神</NickName>
            <AccountName>pop****@aliyunid.test</AccountName>
            <Role>
                <RoleCode>role_workspace_admin</RoleCode>
                <RoleName>管理员</RoleName>
                <RoleId>25</RoleId>
            </Role>
        </Data>
    </Result>
</QueryWorkspaceUserListResponse>","errorExample":""}]
title: 查询工作空间下的成员列表
summary: 查询指定工作空间下的成员列表信息。
